content.en: Laser heating analysis: Researchers have developed efficient algorithms to compute temperature profiles of pulsed laser heating of thin metal films, which are more accurate and faster than conventional approaches. They have also used algorithms, such as the fast Fourier transform (FFT) algorithm, to investigate the efficiency of transient wave generation in a thermoelastic silicon layer excited by a pulsed laser. Additionally, algorithms have been developed to incorporate temperature-dependent phase-lags in models for ultrafast laser heating on gold films, and to analyze the thermomechanical response caused by ultrashort laser heating using one-dimensional and two-dimensional axisymmetric approaches.
content.da: Laseropvarmningsanalyse: Forskere har udviklet effektive algoritmer til at beregne temperaturprofilerne ved pulserende laseropvarmning af tynde metalfilm, som er mere præcise og hurtigere end konventionelle metoder. De har også anvendt algoritmer såsom den hurtige Fourier-transformation (FFT-algoritme) til at undersøge effektiviteten af transient bølgedannelse i et termoelastisk siliciumlag ophidset af en pulserende laser. Desuden er der udviklet algoritmer til at inkorporere temperaturafhængige faseforskydninger i modeller for ultrahurtig laseropvarmning på guldfilm, og til at analysere den termomekaniske respons forårsaget af ultrakort laseropvarmning ved brug af en-dimensionelle og to-dimensionelle akse-symmetriske tilgange.
